author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Harworth Says FY 2017 EPS Up 15.4 Pcy To 15.8P
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Harworth Group Plc:
* 2017 EARNINGS PER SHARE UP 15.4% TO 15.8P (2016: 13.7P) * DIVIDEND PER SHARE INCREASED BY 10% TO 0.828P (2016: 0.753P)
* CHAIRMAN SAYS WILL NOT BE STANDING FOR RE-ELECTION AT THIS YEARâ€™S ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING
* APPOINTS ALASTAIR LYONS CBE AS SUCCESSOR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
